CustomField.description:
IF TYPE = 'DP' -> CUST_ID+TMB_ACCOUNT_ID+TMB_DEPT_NO+MATURITY_DATE IF TYPE = 'DP-DORMANT' -> CUST_ID+TMB_ACCOUNT_ID+TMB_DEPT_NO+DORMANT_DATE IF TYPE = 'MF' -> CUST_ID+TMB_ACCOUNT_ID+ TMB_DEPT_NO+ TMB_PRODUCT_CODE+MATURITY_DATE IF TYPE = 'BA' -> CUST_ID+TMB_ACCOUNT_ID+PAID_UP_DATE+EXPIRY_DATE+NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE
Used as External Id for upsert job from data batch job.
CustomField.label: External Id
